title: [Large-scale] Mobile-Optimized Language Education Design Project

context.prior_knowledge: Basic digital device utilization skills and foundational job-related language proficiency
context.additional_context: A course for professionals in medical, legal, and technical fields to enhance practical language skills in mobile environments, conducted in a BYOD (Bring Your Own Device) setting with collaborative project execution.

learning_goals: Learners can independently design and produce language content optimized for mobile devices
Learners can resolve device compatibility issues through project deliverables based on responsive design
Learners can plan and execute three or more mobile-friendly language learning activities (e.g., speech recognition, augmented reality)
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
